name: Perihelion by Guido Spannocchi - Pre Print - Solar Flare Edition - 1 of 3
description: Exclusive "Solar Flare" Edition of Guido Spannocchi's Perihelion Album Preprint. Black vinyl, handsigned by the artist. Holder's receive life-long access to any of Guido's shows. All funds will be used for upcoming touring and album production. Only 3 black vinyl's where ever pressed. These 3 prints were delivered to the artist to check the quality of the pressing. Each copy was handsigned "audioguido20" by the artist himself. They come in a black pre-print sleeve and are labeled "Test Pressing" Holder's can contact the artist at audioguido@gmail.com to receive their physical copy, shipped anywhere in the world.
